Kaitāia musician’s rare cancer diagnosis in UK sparks fundraising concert https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/kaitaia-musicians-rare-cancer-diagnosis-in-uk-sparks-fundraise-concert/IUVFQOFT5NGAHIKBA5AKJQ7FIQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/kaitaia-musicians-rare-cancer-diagnosis-in-uk-sparks-fundraise-concert/IUVFQOFT5NGAHIKBA5AKJQ7FIQ/ Mike Dinsdale‘’It’s just one way to help a fellow Far North musician.’’ Wed, 28 Aug 2024 19:00:00 +0000 Kaitāia born and raised singer/songwriter Jayson Norris has been diagnosed with a rare and extremely dangerous type of blood cancer in the UK.
